title: Kotobukiya Star Wars: The Mandalorian & Grogu with Beskar Staff ARTFX+ Statue, Multicolor
features: Display freely using the magnets in his feet
Includes a square base containing a steel plate
description: From the Star Wars live-action series, The Mandalorian, this new release joins the ARTFX+ linup equipped with armor and new weapons from The Mandalorian Season 2. This statue portrays the Mandalorian holding a Beskar spear in his right hand, and Grogu in his left, as they continue their journey together. He has been replicated in great detail while being in 1/10 scale. The statue can be displayed freely using the magnets in his feet and the steel plate in the square base.

title: Star Wars The Black Series The Mandalorian
